4.title: vCenters
4.query:
timeseries host_info = avg(vmware.info.host_info), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:vcenter` }
| summarize host_info = countDistinct(`dt.entity.vmware:vcenter`)

5.title: Clusters

6.title: Data Centers
6.query:
timeseries host_info = avg(vmware.info.host_info), by: {`dt.entity.vmware:vcenter`,`dt.entity.vmware:datacenter` }
| summarize host_info = countDistinct(`dt.entity.vmware:datacenter`)

7.title: Active VMs

8.title: Hosts in a Cluster

9.title: Standalone Hosts

10.title: Disconnected Hosts

14.title: VMware Cluster
14.query:
timeseries by: {`dt.entity.vmware:cluster` }, filter: { cluster.name != "No Cluster" },  {
  cpu_capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.capacity),
  cpu_used= avg(vmware.cluster.cpu.used),
  mem_capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.mem.capacity),
  mem_used= avg(vmware.cluster.mem.used),
  storage_capacity = avg(vmware.cluster.storage.capacity),
  storage_used= avg(vmware.cluster.storage.used)
}
| lookup [
    fetch `dt.entity.vmware:cluster`
    | fields id, entity.name, cluster = record(entityId=id, displayName=entity.name, dim="dt.entity.vmware:cluster")
],
 sourceField: `dt.entity.vmware:cluster`,
 lookupField: id,
 fields: cluster
| fieldsAdd 
  name = entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:cluster`),
  cpu_cap      = arrayLast(cpu_capacity),
  cpu_used     = arrayLast(cpu_used),
  mem_cap      = arrayLast(mem_capacity),
  mem_used     = arrayLast(mem_used),
  storage_cap  = arrayLast(storage_capacity),
  storage_used = arrayLast(storage_used)
| fields name, cpu_used, cpu_cap, mem_used, mem_cap, storage_used, storage_cap
| fieldsRename `Cluster`=name, 
               `CPU Used`=cpu_used,
               `CPU Capacity`=cpu_cap,
               `Memory Used`=mem_used,
               `Memory Capacity`=mem_cap,
               `Storage Used`=storage_used,
               `Storage Capacity`=storage_cap

16.title: VMware Host
16.query:
timeseries by: {`dt.entity.vmware:host`}, {
  average_cpu = avg(vmware.host.cpu.usage.average),
  average_mem = avg(vmware.host.mem.usage.average)
}
| fieldsAdd average_cpu = arrayAvg(average_cpu), average_mem = arrayAvg(average_mem), entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:host`), alias: Name
| sort average_cpu desc
| fields Name, average_cpu, average_mem
| fieldsRename `Host Name`=Name, `Average CPU %`=average_cpu, `Average Memory %`=average_mem

17.title: CPU Usage
17.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.host.cpu.usage.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:host` }
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:host`)
| limit 20

18.title: Memory Usage
18.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.host.mem.usage.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:host` }
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:host`)
| limit 20

20.title: VMware VM
20.query:
timeseries by: {`dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`}, {
  average_cpu = avg(vmware.vm.cpu.usage.average),
  average_mem = avg(vmware.vm.mem.usage.average)
}
| fieldsAdd average_cpu = arrayAvg(average_cpu), average_mem = arrayAvg(average_mem), entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`), alias: Name
| sort average_cpu desc
| fields Name, average_cpu, average_mem
| fieldsRename `Host Name`=Name, `Average CPU %`=average_cpu, `Average Memory %`=average_mem

21.title: CPU Usage
21.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.vm.cpu.usage.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine` }
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`)
| limit 20

22.title: Memory Usage
22.query:
timeseries average = avg(vmware.vm.mem.usage.average), by: { `dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine` }
| sort arrayAvg(average) desc
| fieldsAdd entityName(`dt.entity.vmware:virtualmachine`)
| limit 20

24.title: VMware Datastores

25.title: Top Datastore Usage

27.title: vCenter Triggered Alarms & Events
27.query:
fetch logs
| filter(isNotNUll(vcenter.address))
| fields timestamp, `vcenter.address`, `host.name`, content 
| fieldsRename Time=timestamp, vCenter=vcenter.address, Host=host.name, Message=content 
| sort Time desc
